description: The only way I could get it to start was by clicking the launch button after I installed it with the Software app. Then it would run properly out of a terminal window. If I saved the icon to the launch bar and closed julia, clicking the terminal icon only ran terminal, not julia in terminal. Still better than the official version that would not run at all.
La version officiel ne marchait pas pour moi (problème Qt4 plus sous Ubuntu 20.04). Cette version marche sans problème.
